title: Black Honey Café
description: Blog for the Black Honey Café cafeteria. The website was created so that they could display their products on the internet. The cafe is located in Guadalajara Jalisco Mexico

title: Bamp Autos
description: Web application that allows you to schedule appointments with clients. It has authentication, an appointment module to see the status of the appointment, whether pending, completed, etc.

title: Your confort
description: Your Confort makes it easy for people to find accommodation through a mobile application. We focus on providing an intuitive and efficient platform that connects users with rental housing options, providing a reliable and convenient solution to meet their housing needs.

title: API Restful
description: Business management web application designed for stores, which allows you to register and manage products efficiently. It offers a system of roles and permissions to differentiate the tasks of administrators and employees, optimizing internal processes.
